scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf pnpm-lock.yaml && rm -rf apps/web/node_modules && pnpm install
scripts.dev-with-fastapi: concurrently "pnpm --filter ./apps/web dev" "uv sync -p python3.11 && source .venv/bin/activate && python3 -m hypercorn api.index:app --reload -b 0.0.0.0:8000"
scripts.fastapi-dev: uv sync -p python3.11 && source .venv/bin/activate && python3 -m hypercorn api.index:app --reload -b 0.0.0.0:8000
